definition: grain/granule/classifier for small round things (peas, bullets, peanuts, pills, grains etc)
thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal
neutrophil (the most common type of white blood cell)

pinyin: shi4 suan1 xing4 li4 xi4 bao1

definition: basophil granulocytes (rarest type of white blood cell)
pinyin: shi4 jian3 xing4 li4 xi4 bao1

sentences.english: The increase of granulocytes is tumor-dependent.
sentences.chinese: 粒細胞的增加是腫瘤依賴性的。

sentences.english: Objective To explore morphology and clinical significance of binucleated granulocyte in blood diseases.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討雙核粒細胞的形態學及其診斷意義。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the relationship between ceramide and apoptosis of granulosa cells.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討神經酰胺與顆粒細胞凋亡的關係。

sentences.english: Granulosa cell apoptosis was detected by agarose gel electrophoresis.
sentences.chinese: 用瓊脂糖凝膠電泳檢測兩類卵的顆粒細胞凋亡。

sentences.english: Eosinophils can increase with allergic reactions and with parasitic infestations.
sentences.chinese: 當過敏反應和寄生蟲感染時嗜酸性粒細胞會增多。

sentences.english: In general idea, cumulus cell is the best nuclear donor cell for reprogramming.
sentences.chinese: 一般來說，顆粒細胞作爲核供體最易被核重編程。

sentences.english: The eosinophil increase can always be found out via routine blood inspections.
sentences.chinese: 血常規查抄常有嗜酸性粒細胞增多。

sentences.english: Stem cells were mobilized with granulocyte colony-stimulating factor from HLA-identical sibling donors.
sentences.chinese: 供者採用粒細胞集落刺激因子皮下注射動員幹細胞。

sentences.english: A few of granular cells have typical nucleolus.
sentences.chinese: 還觀察到極少的顆粒細胞具有典型的核仁。

sentences.english: Hyaline casts were admixed with neutrophils.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃品摻合了嗜中性粒細胞。

sentences.english: Peripheral leukocyte and acidophilic granulocyte were decreased.
sentences.chinese: 外周血白細胞與嗜酸性粒細胞減少。

sentences.english: The diagnosis of angiolymphoid hyperplasia with eosinophilia was confirmed.
sentences.chinese: 血管淋巴樣增生伴嗜酸粒細胞增多症。

sentences.english: Recombinant human granulocyte stimulating factor (GSF) was bought from Qilu Pharmacy Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 重組人粒細胞刺激因子購於齊魯製藥有限公司。

sentences.english: Here, the mucosa shows ulceration and undermining by an extensive neutrophilic exudate.
sentences.chinese: 圖示黏膜層可見潰瘍，內有大量的中性粒細胞滲出。

sentences.english: Here you can see a particulate organelle called the ribosome.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏您可以看到一個名爲顆粒細胞的核糖體。

sentences.english: The use of granulocyte colony-stimulating factor to prevent granulocytopenia was not permitted.
sentences.chinese: 試驗中不預防使用粒細胞集落刺激因子。
